name: Mouse Mayhem Game Pro
description:
All the Fun, None of the Ads.

Mouse Mayhem is the ultimate adventure across a vast land . Mouse Mayhem comes across many unforeseen dangers and enemies as she follows a trail of magical coins and mystical objects that help her along her quest.

Help Mouse Mayhem on this action packed adventure journey, as the mouse leaps from platform to platform, through a challenging maze of obstacles and dangerous bad guys.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Mouse Mayhem, LIVE in the App Store, TODAY!
